about_the_game:
TSW Compatible content released for a previous Train Sim World® - features may remain unchanged from the original release and may not make use of all newer core features.

Adventure to the Alps and traverse narrow-gauge territory, drive famed RhB services as you climb, descend and weave your way through the cross-border peaks of Switzerland, and for the first time, Italy. You are invited into the stunning Alpine landscape of Europe, with Rivet Games’ Berninalinie for Train Sim World®!

Stretching across the top of the Swiss Bernina Pass at Ospizio Bernina, over 2km above sea level, and making a daring path along the sides of mountains to the town of Tirano, marking Italy’s debut in Train Sim World, the Berninalinie ranks among the highest railways in Europe, and the World’s steepest, bearing down or steadily climbing 7% (1:14) gradients.

Packed with detail, the picturesque Swiss Alps tower over this metre-gauge spectacle, from the hairpin turns and tunnels of Alp Grüm, to the unmistakable Brusio Spiral Viaduct. The slower pace of valley running gives one a chance to take in the views, either as a driver or fully relaxing as a passenger.

Take on the role of an RhB driver for the Berninalinie, at the helm of the modern and stylish ABe 8/12 Allegra EMU. Operate passenger services with this 3-car unit, but with the additional ability to not only haul additional passenger coaches behind it, but also offering the unique opportunity for EMU-hauled freight! Capable of handling anything, the Allegra holds its own on the steepest of gradients, but you still must learn the art of safely stopping while perched atop peaks.

Whether you’re rolling through the streets of Italy, or dancing up the faces of mountains, an incredible experience awaits with Rivet Games’ Berninalinie: Tirano - Ospizio Bernina in Train Sim World®!

Key Features


  • 38km of the Bernina Railway between Ospizio Bernina, Switzerland and Tirano, Italy
  • RhB ABe 8/12 Allegra EMU in RhB red livery
  • RhB ZA Tank Wagon
  • RhB SP-W Timber Wagon
  • EW-1 A and B coaches
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cab, including an auto announcer in 3 different languages
  • True-to-life performance and handling
  • 5 Scenarios, including a festive scenario, and an authentic Timetable
  • Journey Mode tying together Training, Scenarios and Timetabled Services
  • A selection of Route Tasks to complete
  • Explore the route and trains in Free Roam
  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download size: 5.3 GB
